item.title: No chin...where do I put?
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

[code]if(playerLook[0] == 0)
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard);
else
playerProps.writeByte(0);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(-1);
playerProps.writeWord(npcId);
